ext_description.p: A Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation is the association between one or more of a and one of a , or a . The Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation is intended for use where legacy data may need to be exchanged via this Standard or where complex patterns of are to be created. The Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation specifies parametric data to be input to an algorithm. The algorithm output shall be the individual shapes. Once the individual shapes are available, they may be used if explicit shape data is required by a receiving processor. If the individual shapes are provided, the attribute derived_planar_shape shall be populated to identify the derived shapes. The units used in the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation shall be those specified in the global geometric for the design as specified by .
ext_description.note: A Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation is not intended to be used to represent a complex resulting from multiple design intent modifications to a basic shape. The other types of shape representation should be used to convey that information.
ext_description.example: The Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation for a "dot" pattern used in manufacturing will result in multiple for one instance of Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation. Legacy vector formats that "paint" filled areas using a successive approximation application of a constant width curve may be supported with Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation using the option. If the curve width varies, use of multiple may be appropriate.

ext_description.p: the represented_stratum_feature specifies the role of the for the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation. There may be more than one for the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation if the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation is discontiguous.
ext_description.note: More than one is required if the shape of the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation is not a contiguous shape, since is required to be a single contiguous shape.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the shape_styled_area_representation specifies one of a , or a as the representation for the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation.

the derived_planar_shape specifies the role of the for the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation. There may be more than one for the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation if the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation is discontiguous. The need not be supplied for the Stratum_feature_styled_area_representation.
A Stratum_feature_in_stratum_planar_position is the two-dimensional position and orientation of a two-dimensional model of a in the two-dimensional model of the .
the feature_shape specifies either a or a for the Stratum_feature_in_stratum_planar_position.
the transformation specifies the role of the for the Stratum_feature_in_stratum_planar_position.
the stratum_shape specifies the role of the for the Stratum_feature_in_stratum_planar_position.
A Stratum_feature_planar_shape is a that represents a planar shape of a .
the represented_stratum_feature specifies the that is to be characterized by the Stratum_feature_planar_shape.
A Stratum_interconnect_module_planar_position is the position of the model in the model in two dimensions.
the transformation specifies the role of the for the Stratum_interconnect_module_planar_position.
the interconnect_module_shape specifies the for the model for the Stratum_interconnect_module_planar_position.
the stratum_shape specifies the for the model for the Stratum_interconnect_module_planar_position.
the stratum_component specifies the role of the for the Stratum_interconnect_module_planar_position.
A Stratum_planar_shape is the two-dimensional shape model of a .
the shape_characterized_stratum specifies the role of the for the Stratum_planar_shape.
